title: France panorama. [No. 72/39]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Flashes: Walls of Paris - naive paintings on old walls in neighbourhoods which are to be rebuilt; Works of young sculptors - modern sculpture show before the UNESCO building in Paris. 2. Surfing - European surfboard riding championships at Biarritz. 3. Oil prospecting - prospecting for undersea oil deposits. 4. Guillevic, poet - thumbnail sketch of a French poet. 5. European majolicas - retrospect of European majolica work at France’s National Museum in Sevres.
